de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows

Class SensorStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.UnifiedSensorWorkflow
      • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.SensorStatistics

  • public class SensorStatistics
extends UnifiedSensorWorkflow
    Flink workflow that calculates aggregated statistics from the sensor data that can be used for data exploration and matching sensor locations with weather stations.

      • collectStatistics

        static void collectStatistics(Type sensorType,
                              java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                              org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                              org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv)
        Calculates aggregated statistics for all sensor data of a given type in the base directory and stores it in a csv-file.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - The sensor type for which the statistics should be calculated.
        dataDirectory - The base directory containing all sensor data.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        tEnv - A table execution environment to use.
